name: ORAL HEALTH TEST
title: Assess Your Oral Health
instructions: Answer the following questions based on your oral health symptoms. Score: 1 = Never, 2 = Sometimes, 3 = Frequently, 4 = Often, 5 = Always. Total score at the end of each section will let you know your oral health risks and suggested recommendations immediately.

sections.name: oral-health
sections.title: Oral Health & Dental Problems
sections.description: Tobacco causes gum disease, mouth ulcers, and pre-cancerous oral lesions like Leukoplakia and OSMF.

questions.question: Do you frequently have mouth ulcers or sores that take a long time to heal?
Do you experience a burning sensation while eating spicy or hot food?
Have you noticed white, red, or dark patches inside your mouth?
Do you suffer from bleeding gums, bad breath, or loose teeth?
Have you had a biopsy or diagnosis of precancerous oral lesions (e.g., Leukoplakia, Erythroplakia, OSMF)?
